name: Idle Kingdom Defense
description:
Become a champion in this idle defense game!
• Eliminate the endless hordes of invading monsters and save the Kingdom!
• Collect various Heroes and upgrade them.
• Collect amazing Weapons and enhance them!
• Challenge Legions with unique traits.
• Eliminate the Giant Boss and obtain amazing rewards!
• You can even play if you are not connected to a network.


Terms of Service : http://stormxgames.com/policy/en/index.html?policy=termsOfService
Privacy Policy : http://stormxgames.com/policy/en/index.html?policy=privacy
